mapper.select: select a.*,b.USER_NAME,c.UPGFLOW_NODE_NAME,c.UPGFLOW_NODE_URL from ecm_app_upgfor a ,web_user b ,ecm_upgflow_node c where a.APP_UPG_ID= #{appUpgId ,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.APP_UPGFOR_USERID = b.USER_ID AND a.UPGFLOW_NODE_ID =c.UPGFLOW_NODE_ID order by a.APP_UPGFOR_TIME
mapper.insert:
insert into ecm_app_upgfor
APP_UPGFOR_ID,
APP_UPG_ID,
UPGFLOW_NODE_ID,
APP_UPGFOR_TIME,
APP_UPGFOR_USERID,
#{appUpgforId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{appUpgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{upgflowNodeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{appUpgforTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{appUpgforUserid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
